content: bea kaptur keeping warm looking cool designed with function and fashion in mind… the inspiration for the hat and name came from a field of plants which are planted evenly in row… pole in polish means field pole hat is a medium weight hat designed for chilly autumn or a bit warmer winter pole hat has a simple seamless construction which is broken by 4 sets of decreases it is knitted bottom up it can be worn folded with a snug fit or slouchy pole hat © 2022 a handknit design by beata kaptur bea kaptur the pattern sizes abbreviations small medium co cast on cdd centered double decrease slip 2 sts together as if to k2tog measurements knit next st pass the 2 slipped sts over the knitted st also refer to circumference around brim 42 46 cm / 16 18 https //beakapturdesigns blogspot com/2018/01/centered-double- fit head circumference 48 52 54 60 cm / 20½ 21½ 21¼ -
